channel.title: Party room need help (made from scratch)
channel.description:
I am currently working on a party room. It is not the baloon thing for events and stuff. It is a place where you can buy a ticket and use it on the lever and a drop party goes on its own. It has way more features but i need help in the drop party thing. It is all working but i want to make a dropparty.cfg so i can put the items in there i want dropped. Can anyone help me on doing this??
This is the code:
[code]int itemid = misc.random(5000);[/code]

item.title: Party room need help (made from scratch)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew1112 Andrew1112
item.description:
@Andrew1112 wrote:

Lol im using the drop party code.

for (int x = 2608; x > 2603; x--) { for (int y = 3099; y > 3083; y--) { try { int itemid = misc.random(5000); ItemHandler.addItem(itemid - 1, x, y, 1, playerId, false); Thread.sleep(10); } catch (Exception e) { } } } }

I need that to randomly choose from a dropparty.cfg I tried to be as specific as possible

Read full topic
item.source: Party room need help (made from scratch)

item.title: Party room need help (made from scratch)
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

I think I’ve seen that line in a tut, so be honest if you want help.
Look in NPCHandler.java, it reads from 3 .cfgs
public boolean loadAutoSpawn(String FileName) {
^is a good example, look and learn
This’ll also be good for you because you’ll learn how to use bufferedReader and hopefully spark some curiosity

Read full topic
